contents.text: Thank you for calling HotSchedules in San Francisco, the intelligent operating platform that makes good managers great.
To discover our platform features and solutions, press 1.
For a personalized product tour, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a concise overview of HotSchedules platform features from a product specialist.
Get a personalized walkthrough to see how HotSchedules can help me manage my team after military service.
I’d like a comprehensive demo of your scheduling platform’s key features and dashboard analytics.
I’d like a one-on-one walkthrough of how HotSchedules works.
I’d like a guided walkthrough of the platform’s features to see how it could manage my research group’s shifts.

contents.text: To discuss pricing, plans, and integration options, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team.

navigationGoals: Discuss pricing tiers and integration options with the sales team.
Discuss pricing plans and integration options to determine if HotSchedules fits my budget and existing systems.
I need details on subscription pricing, plan options, and API integration capabilities.
I need to go over pricing, plan options, and integrations.
I want details on subscription plans and how to integrate this scheduling tool with our physics lab calendar.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue and restore app functionality.
Resolve a technical issue preventing my schedules from syncing correctly.
I’m troubleshooting a sync failure between my POS and the scheduling app.
I’m experiencing a technical issue and need assistance troubleshooting.
I’m experiencing an error syncing my lab’s shift data—need technical support to troubleshoot.

contents.text: For employee engagement and training resources, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our engagement specialists.

navigationGoals: Explore employee engagement and training resources for my staff.
Find employee engagement and training resources to onboard my team smoothly.
I want to explore tools for employee training workflows and engagement tracking.
I want to find out about employee engagement and training resources.
I need training materials to onboard new team members onto the scheduling system and boost engagement.
